html.title: We will be right back
html.header: We will be back for you in a moment!
html.wait_text: if you'd rather wait, just leave this tab open, we'll refresh for you every 5 seconds, you'll be sent to the page as soon as we're ready to go again!

json.message: Oh snap! Normally here should be a snappy JSON response. Unfortunately the service is currently not available. We will be back shortly!

xml.message: Oh snap! Normally here should be a snappy XML response. Unfortunately the service is currently not available. We will be back shortly!
